statement: Storing an immutable, schema-validated run-config snapshot (with code/version metadata) as the durable source of truth will improve reproducibility and rollback safety.
rationale: Workflow engines emphasize versioned deployment configs and immutable code references for reproducibility and rollback.
keyAssumptions: Config snapshots can be stored without excessive storage cost
validationCriteria: Runs can be recreated from stored config + code metadata
critiquePoints: Some configs may include secrets or ephemeral tokens
questions: What fields must be redacted or stored by reference?
